reviews.text: This serum is amazing! My skin feels so much better.
Very disappointed, it caused a breakout. Would not buy again.
It is okay, but I have used better cleansers before.
Absolutely terrible service and the product was leaky.
Best purchase of 2023. Five stars for the hydrating mist!
The night cream works well, but the smell is a bit strong.

testimonials.content: I've been a loyal customer all through 2023!
